Detailed Description

Record and play Wave files on SD and SDHC cards.

uint16_t  rate,
uint8_t  pin,
uint8_t  ref 
)

record to a preallocated contiguous file

Parameters:
[in]fileFile to use for recording
[in]rateRecord rate in samples/second.
[in]pinAnalog pin connected to microphone amp.
[in]refType of analog reference to use.
Returns:
true for success or false for failure.
